context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Essential Facts

## Working Systems
- **Faceted** - 2D geometric patterns (WORKING)
- **Quantum** - 3D lattice effects (WORKING)
- **Holographic** - Audio-reactive (WORKING)

## NOT Working
- **Polychora** - PLACEHOLDER ONLY, do not use

## What VIB3+ Creates
Shader-based animated backgrounds and visual effects for:
- Landing page backgrounds
- Portfolio sites
- Interactive art
- Music visualizers
- Creative web experiences

## What VIB3+ Does NOT Do
- Does not render literal 3D/4D geometric shapes
- "Hypercube" = hypercube-inspired pattern, not a wireframe
- "4D rotation" = shader morphing parameters, not projection math

## Two Repositories
| Repo | Use For |
|------|--------|
| vib3-plus-engine | Embedding, customizing UI |
| vib34d-vib3plus | Building custom apps with SDK |

context_blocks.name: Workflow: Embedding VIB3+
context_blocks.content:
# Embedding VIB3+ in a Webpage

## When to Use This
- Adding animated background to existing site
- Quick prototypes
- No build tools needed

## Steps

### 1. Choose System
Pick from: `faceted`, `quantum`, or `holographic`
(NOT polychora - it's broken)

### 2. Choose Geometry (0-23)
```
geometry = coreIndex * 8 + baseIndex

Base (0-7): tetra, hypercube, sphere, torus, klein, fractal, wave, crystal
Core: 0=base, 1=hypersphere warp, 2=hypertetra warp
```

### 3. Set Parameters via URL
```
?system=holographic&geometry=5&hue=280&gridDensity=20&intensity=0.7
```

### 4. Embed
```html
<iframe 
  src="https://domusgpt.github.io/vib3-plus-engine/?system=holographic&geometry=5&hue=280"
  style="position:fixed;inset:0;width:100%;height:100%;border:none;z-index:-1">
</iframe>
```

## URL Parameters
| Param | Range | Purpose |
|-------|-------|--------|
| system | faceted/quantum/holographic | Render engine |
| geometry | 0-23 | Pattern type |
| hue | 0-360 | Base color |
| gridDensity | 5-100 | Pattern detail |
| intensity | 0-1 | Brightness |
| speed | 0.1-3 | Animation rate |

context_blocks.name: Workflow: Customizing VIB3+
context_blocks.content:
# Customizing VIB3+ Application

## When to Use This
- Modify UI controls
- Add new features
- Change default behavior
- Remove unwanted elements

## Steps

### 1. Clone
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Domusgpt/vib3-plus-engine
cd vib3-plus-engine
```

### 2. Understand Structure
Everything is in `index.html` (~42KB). Key sections:
- CSS styles (inline)
- HTML structure (nav, canvas containers, control bezels)
- JS modules loaded in order
- Global state initialization

### 3. Key Global Functions
```javascript
window.switchSystem(name)      // 'faceted'|'quantum'|'holographic'
window.selectGeometry(0-23)    // Change pattern
window.updateParameter(id,val) // Any slider value
window.randomizeAll()          // Randomize everything
window.toggleAudio()           // Audio reactivity
```

### 4. Key Global State
```javascript
window.currentSystem          // Active system
window.userParameterState     // All parameters
window.moduleReady            // Init complete flag
```

### 5. Test with Keyboard Shortcuts
- `1-3` Switch systems (NOT 4 - polychora broken)
- `Alt+Q/W/E/R/A/S/D/F` Geometry selection
- `Space` Randomize
- `G` Gallery
- `?` Help modal

Parameter Reference
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Parameters

## Rotation (6D)
| Param | Range | Description |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| rot4dXY | -6.28 to 6.28 | XY plane rotation |
| rot4dXZ | -6.28 to 6.28 | XZ plane |
| rot4dYZ | -6.28 to 6.28 | YZ plane |
| rot4dXW | -6.28 to 6.28 | X into W (4D) |
| rot4dYW | -6.28 to 6.28 | Y into W |
| rot4dZW | -6.28 to 6.28 | Z into W |

## Visual
| Param | Range | Default |
|-------|-------|--------|
| gridDensity | 5-100 | 15 |
| morphFactor | 0-2 | 1.0 |
| chaos | 0-1 | 0.2 |
| speed | 0.1-3 | 1.0 |

## Color
| Param | Range | Default |
|-------|-------|--------|
| hue | 0-360 | 200 |
| saturation | 0-1 | 0.8 |
| intensity | 0-1 | 0.5 |

## Geometry Formula
`geometry = coreIndex * 8 + baseIndex`

Base 0-7: tetra, hypercube, sphere, torus, klein, fractal, wave, crystal
Core 0-2: base, hypersphere, hypertetra
